channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘The Wailing’ Is a Korean Horror Masterpiece You Can’t Brace Yourself For
item.description: Director Na Hong-jin’s shamanic possession thriller earns its place among the genre’s finest for its unflinching exploration of superstition, dread, and post-colonial paranoia.

item.title: Verizon has free phones - even the iPhone 17 Pro - and I've tried them all, here's what to buy and what to skip
item.description: You can get a phone for free if you sign a three-year agreement with Verizon, but not all those free phones are worth buying. Here are my favorites from those I've tested.

item.title: This Black Friday PS5 deal gets you the popular console for just AU$449 – but that's not all
item.description: The PS5 hasn't seen a major discount in some time, but for Black Friday it's now down to under AU$450 – there's a tempting discount on the PSVR 2, too.

item.title: 5 things that annoy me about Android
item.description: Android is a superb operating system, but it and the phones that run it still have some annoyances.

item.title: I test headphones for a living — these are the 7 best early Black Friday deals
item.description: Bose and Sony headphones make up the best audio deals ahead of Black Friday — here are the 7 best deals our headphones expert found.

item.title: 60+ Black Friday Target deals: Early shoppers save big on TVs, air fryers, streaming sticks, and headphones
item.description: Target's early Black Friday deals and doorbusters include big savings on Bose speakers, Beats headphones, Keurig coffee makers, and TCL TVs.

item.title: The ‘Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles’ Are Getting New a Live-Action Movie
item.description: 'Sonic the Hedgehog' producer Neal H. Moritz has been tapped to bring the Turtles back to live-action.

item.title: Google steps up AI scam protection in India, but gaps remain
item.description: Google is expanding its real-time scam-detection and screen-sharing fraud warnings in India.

item.title: 4 People Indicted in Alleged Conspiracy to Smuggle Supercomputers and Nvidia Chips to China
item.description: A federal prosecutor alleged that one defendant boasted that his father “had engaged in similar business for the Chinese Communist Party.”

item.title: RIP mobile hotspots - Netgear's new Nighthawk 5G M7 features Wi-Fi 7 connectivity and even global eSIM support
item.description: Netgear Nighthawk 5G M7 offers Wi-Fi 7 speeds, global eSIM support, and multi-device connectivity in a compact portable hotspot.

item.title: Yeah, iPads are on sale, but there are bigger savings on Android tablets this Black Friday
item.description: Ahead of Black Friday, we've rounded up all the best deals on tablets. Shop all the best deals on Apple, Amazon, Samsung, Lenovo, and more.

item.title: Grok’s Elon Musk worship is getting weird
item.description: It’s no secret that Elon Musk shapes the X social platform and X’s “maximally truth-seeking” Grok AI chatbot to his preferences. But it’s possible Musk may have needed a bit of an extra ego boost this week, because Grok’s worship of its creator seems, shall we say, more noticeable than usual. As a number of […]

item.title: 65+ early Black Friday deals: Score huge discounts on MacBooks, Kindles, Bose headphones, and Ninja appliances
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: Joe Rogan Subreddit Bans ‘Political’ Posts, Sends Fans Into Fits of Confusion
item.description: "Will you ban Joe Rogan from talking about politics then?" one commenter asked

item.title: Google’s new AI image creator took my shirt off
item.description: I gave Google's new Nano Banana Pro a try, and it immediately took my clothes off. I didn't ask it to, but the AI model evidently decided my greetings card would look better with more skin. Nano Banana Pro is, as the name suggests, aimed at professionals. Powered by Gemini 3, it's effectively an upgrade […]

item.title: Joby Aviation makes ‘corporate espionage’ claims in lawsuit against rival Archer
item.description: Joby alleges one of its former employees shared stolen trade secrets when he was hired by Archer.

item.title: A New Record Has Been Set for Most Valuable Comic Book Ever
item.description: A near perfect copy of 'Superman #1' just sold for over 9 million dollars.

item.title: Get unlimited free entertainment for $20 with this streaming alternative
item.description: Ditch the expensive streaming services and enjoy an endless stream of free content with a lifetime subscription to BitMar Streaming Content Finder, on sale now for $19.99 (reg. $150).

item.title: 45+ Walmart Black Friday deals: Walmart is pretty much giving away Magic Bullet blenders at $15 apiece
item.description: The best Walmart Black Friday deals include more than 50% discounts on Magic Bullet Blenders and record prices on Apple AirPods and Dyson vacuums.

item.title: Microsoft’s AI-powered copy and paste can now use on-device AI
item.description: Microsoft is upgrading its Advanced Paste tool in PowerToys for Windows 11, allowing you to use an on-device AI model to power some of its features. With the 0.96 update, you can route requests through Microsoft’s Foundry Local tool or the open-source Ollama, both of which run AI models on your device’s neural processing unit […]

item.title: Verizon Begins Laying Off Thousands of Workers
item.description: Another tech giant commences with mass firings.

item.title: Meta’s Hyperscape is ready to turn your real living room into a VR hangout
item.description: Meta’s impressive, photorealistic digital replicas of real places built using its “Hyperscape” capture tech, which uses the cameras on a Quest 3 or Quest 3S VR headset to scan a room, have so far been solitary spaces. If you wanted to visit a virtual version of a room in your house (or of Gordon Ramsay’s […]
